name: Defence on Titan
description:
Protect the Saturn's satellite: Titan. Unravel the mystery that space hides.

 

Important Notes and Warnings!
  • Please use desktop builds for better graphics and performance!  
  • Please use desktop builds if your browser cannot run the game.

 

Controls
  • Aim - Mouse Cursor
  • Shoot - Left Click

 

How to Play? Shoot'em up.

The spaceship moves faster when not attacking :)

 

Team Members
  • KoltPenny (Developer)
  • SigmaStar (Developer)
  • Carras (Artist)
